sense.gloss: if so, in that case, in that situation

sdata.e: Marry first and love will follow.

sdata.e: Why didn't you tell us about this earlier? We'd have been able to do something about it.

sdata.e: Lay it down on paper so everyone understands better.

sdata.e: When I look back upon those days, it all seems like a dream.
